p: There was a difference in the kinetics of weight loss between the Ad5- and Ad6-injected groups: the Ad5-challenged animals lost weight fast for the first 3 to 5 days of the study, but then the surviving hamsters started recovering ( Figure 1B). Conversely, animals in the Ad6-infected vehicle-treated group looked healthier for the first 3 days of the study; however, these animals started losing weight rapidly from day 4 on ( Figure 1B).
